Name: Battle Imagine - â€‹Venobzzar Incubator
Description:
Use to activate or upgrade Venobzzar Incubator's Battle Imagine skill: Arcane! Poison Explosion.

Arcane! Poison Explosion
Summon Boss: Venobzzar Incubator to continuously attack surrounding units, dealing Attack Damage. Each attack inflicts Vulnerability on the target, and your DMG dealt to the target is increased.
(This effect cannot stack and only one will be effective.)
Description2: A crystallization of thoughts, consciousness, and Engram, possessing supernatural power. This principle has not been unraveled since the Bapharian civilization.
